description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that initializes environment variables, local storage, and sets up app-wide state management with providers. Defines the root widget 'PlutoApp' which configures themes and routing.

classes.name: PlutoApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up providers and configuring the MaterialApp.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point to initialize environment, local storage, and run the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, setting up providers and the MaterialApp configuration.
